wave_0_per_frame3=monitor = vol;
wave_0_per_frame4=beat = above(vol,res)*above(vol,m)*above(vol,16);
wave_0_per_frame5=diff = (1-beat)*diff + beat*(vol-res);

shape_3_per_frame1=an = an + 0.5*q16/num_inst;

shape_3_per_frame10=
per_frame_1=t = -time*0.2;
per_frame_2=pi3 = 3.1415*2/3;
per_frame_3=c = 5-pow(bass,5)*1;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=r = sin(t)*c;
per_frame_6=r = if(above(r,1),1,r);
per_frame_7=r = if(below(r,0),0,r);
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=g = sin(t+pi3)*c;
per_frame_10=g = if(above(g,1),1,g);
per_frame_11=g = if(below(g,0),0,g);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=b = sin(t-pi3)*c;
per_frame_14=b = if(above(b,1),1,b);
per_frame_15=b = if(below(b,0),0,b);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=ib_r = r;//0.5+sin(time)*0.5;
per_frame_18=ib_g = g;//0.5+sin(time)*0.5;
per_frame_19=ib_b = b;//0.5-sin(time)*0.5;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=zoom = 1 - bass*0.0051;
per_frame_22=rot = sin(time)*0.001;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_4=`    float3 dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_5=`    float3 dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_6=`float2 dz = -float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*1;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
warp_9=`ret = 0;
warp_10=`ret.x = tex2d(sampler_fw_main,uv - dz).x - 0.0 - (GetBlur3(uv).x-GetBlur1(uv+dz).x) ;
warp_11=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret = GetPixel(uv).x*(1-GetBlur2(uv).x);
comp_4=`ret += (1-GetPixel(uv).x)*GetBlur1(uv).x*float3(2,1.2,0);
comp_5=`}
